attributes.action: Change child benefit rules to whole household income.
attributes.additional_details: To support families where one parent stays at home or works only a few hours so that they can raise their children. To ensure that tax payers money is being appropriately spent.
attributes.background: Eligiblity for child benefit should be based on Total household income not individuals.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300149
